name: Cyber Space Ninja X-treme 2000
description:
Controls:
WASD/Arrows - Move
Space bar - Attack

You are a cyber space ninja fending off other cyber space ninjas and robots as you protect the mysterious extractor.

Entry for the Ludum Dare 50 game jam.

Due to scope issues and forgetting to take time off work we were unable to bring the game to the state we wanted.
